name: Pintar
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Pintar Automation offers the most convenient voice controlled experience with Alexa. Control your smart products with simple and convenient voice commands in multiple languages.
With this skill, you don’t have to worry about the remote or your phone to control smart products. Speak simple commands to make smart products working around you!
Few simple commands like these can do it all for you:
“Alexa, turn on bedroom light” or
“Alexa, bedroom light on”

“Alexa, turn off garage light” or
“Alexa, garage light off”

“Alexa, set dining room light to 70%” or
“Alexa, dining room light to 70%”
It is now very simple and easy to connect Alexa to your Pintar app. Follow the simple steps below to get you amazon device access of your smart products and obey your commands!
1.Download “Pintar” app in iOS App Store and Google Play Store.
2.Make an account and connect all your devices with “Pintar” app.
3.Change the device name as you please to call it with.
4.Now in your Alexa app enable the skill for “Pintar” in the skills section.
5.Input your “Pintar” account credentials, you will be directed to the success page.
6.Your are all set to enjoy controlling all your products through voice commands.

For visual support check out the respective product page on our website.

If you have any concerns regarding the skill, you may contact us via email:
support@pintar.pk
